q_es_start.text: ({npc:3441} looks very upset, shifting from foot to foot)

options.text: What happened, {npc:3441}? You don't seem yourself.
Sorry, no time to talk right now.

q_es_problem.text: Oh, {player_name}... Can you imagine, I... I wanted to give a gift to someone special, {npc:6243}. Item {item:180}, so elegant. And last night... damn cards! Lost it to that scoundrel, {npc:3575}! Now I don't know what to do.

options.text: Maybe I can help with something?
Sounds like your problem, not mine.

q_es_request_help.text: Really? Oh, {player_name}, you'd really help me out! Maybe you could talk to {npc:3575}? I'm sure he's somewhere in the city, probably in the tavern. Please, find out if he'll give {item:180} back. I'll pay!

options.text: Alright, I'll try to find {npc:3575} and get {item:180} back.
Changed my mind. Deal with it yourself.

q_es_refuse_help.text: I understand... Well, thanks for listening.
